actions.description: The Shard Shunner makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.
actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.
actions.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only)

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)

actions.description: 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)

damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
name: Shard Shunner

specialTraits.description: The Shard Shunner can use their action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into their true form, which is humanoid. Their statistics, other than their size, are the same in each form. Any equipment they are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. They revert to their true form if they die.
specialTraits.name: Shapechanger

specialTraits.description: The Shard Shunner has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
specialTraits.name: Keen Smell

specialTraits.description: The Shard Shunner can move through the space of creatures that is of a size larger than them.
specialTraits.name: Halfling Nimbleness

specialTraits.description: The Shard Shunner has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
specialTraits.name: Brave
